info.title: US Congress CRS (Independent Publisher)
info.description: A collection of endpoints to view, retrieve, and re-use machine-readable data from collections available on Congress.gov. Legislative activity only.

get.summary: Amendment: Get a list of amendments by date of latest action
get.description: Example: https://api.congress.gov/v3/amendment?api_key=[INSERT_KEY]

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The data format. Value can be xml or json

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting record returned. 0 is the first record

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.description: Starting timestamp for updated date YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.description: Ending timestamp for updated date YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

400.description: Invalid request. The input parameters are incorrect.

get.summary: Amendment: Get a list of amendments by congress
get.description: Get a list of amendments filtered by congress, sorted by date of latest action

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: The congress number. For example, the value can be 117

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The data format. Value can be xml or json

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting record returned. 0 is the first record

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records returned. The maximum limit is 250

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.description: Start timestamp by updated date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.description: The ending timestamp to filter by update date. Use format: YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z

400.description: Invalid request. The input parameters are incorrect.

parameters.name: format

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting record index. Default: 0

get.description: Example request: https://api.congress.gov/v3/member/MI/10?api_key=[INSERT_KEY]

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: Two-letter state code representing the state the member represents. Example: MI (Michigan).

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: The congressional district number of the member. Example: 10.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format: xml or json.

parameters.name: currentMember
parameters.description: Filters results by active members only (true/false). Use `true` for current Congress data only.

get.summary: Member: Get a list of members filtered by congress, state and district
get.description: https://api.congress.gov/v3/member/congress/97/TX/10?currentMember=False&api_key=[INSERT_KEY]

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: The Congress number. For example, 118

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: The two letter identifier for the state the member represents. For example, the value can be MI for Michigan

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: The district number for the district the member represents. For example, the value can be 10

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The data format. Value can be xml or json

parameters.name: currentMember
parameters.description: The status of the member. Use true or false. Use currentMember=True for the current congress data only
